page.title: 13EDUCATION IN DEEPCAR
page.content: {Royd Infants}Built 1966. 232 children, 9 classes inc. rising 5s. Nursery unit due to be completed by Nov. 1985. Own kitchen, dining room and playing field. Headteacher Mrs.K. Senior. {St. John's Junior (C of E Aided)} Built 1967. 250 ch. Ages 7-11. 10 classes. Own kitchen and dining room. Large, tiered playing fields incl. football pitch. Both schools flat roofed, single storey buildings with St. John's having split level. 8 self-contained and 4 semi-open plan classrooms. Headteacher Mr.J.Chadwick. {Stocksbridge College Annexe.}Original National School then Church School. Used for O/A levels day and evening, Salford Poly. feeder crs., Management crs., social/ind. studies unit. {Playgroups} Wood Royd, with its own premises next to the playground, and Village Hall on Helliwell Lane.
